fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Go on alert at your house during the night. 2 Uses.
- Go on alert at another player's house during the night. Does not have to be authorized. 2 Uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you go on alert, you will attack the visitors of your target.
- If you go on alert at your house, you will also gain basic defense.
- Roleblock & Control Immunity
